scripts.dev: concurrently -k -r -s first "npm run --prefix ui dev" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.start:electron: wait-on http://localhost:5173 dist-electron/electron/preload.js dist-electron/electron/main.js && electron dist-electron/electron/main.js
scripts.build: npm run --prefix ui build && npm run build:electron
scripts.build:electron: tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && cp -r ui/dist dist-electron/ui || true
